title: Pixel 2/2 XL can use eSIM in Android 10 ? (Non-Google Fi)
content:
Android Q Beta 6 can add eSIM (I guess), but Android 10 official does not have to add eSIM. I suspect that Google Pixel 2 can use eSIM ? (non-Google Fi ) because some people say that his pixel 2 can scan the QR code to use eSIM ( he uses Android 10 official)

Pixel 3 can use eSIM network in Thailand but Pixel 2... I'm not sure.
